Package au.csiro.pathling.fhirpath.collection

Class Collection

java.lang.Object
au.csiro.pathling.fhirpath.collection.Collection
Direct Known Subclasses:
BooleanCollection, CodingCollection, DateCollection, DateTimeCollection, DecimalCollection, EmptyCollection, IntegerCollection, MixedCollection, ReferenceCollection, ResourceCollection, StringCollection, TimeCollection
public class Collection extends Object
Represents a collection of nodes that are the result of evaluating a FHIRPath expression.
Author:
John Grimes

      public Collection()

  • Method Details

    • build

      @Nonnull public static Collection build(@Nonnull ColumnRepresentation columnRepresentation, @Nonnull Enumerations.FHIRDefinedType fhirType, @Nonnull Optional<ElementDefinition> definition)
      Builds the appropriate subtype of Collection based upon the supplied ElementDefinition.

      Use this builder when the path may need to be traversable.

      Parameters:
      columnRepresentation - a Column containing the result of the expression
      fhirType - the Enumerations.FHIRDefinedType that this path should be based upon
      definition - the ElementDefinition that this path should be based upon
      Returns:
      a new Collection
      Throws:
      CollectionConstructionError - if there is a problem constructing the collection

    • build

      @Nonnull public static Collection build(@Nonnull ColumnRepresentation columnRepresentation, @Nonnull Optional<Column> extensionMapColumn, @Nonnull ElementDefinition definition)
      Builds the appropriate subtype of Collection based upon the supplied ElementDefinition.

      Use this builder when the path is the child of another path, and will need to be traversable.

      Parameters:
      columnRepresentation - a Column containing the result of the expression
      extensionMapColumn - an optional extension map column
      definition - the ElementDefinition that this path should be based upon
      Returns:
      a new Collection
      Throws:
      CollectionConstructionError - if there is a problem constructing the collection

    • build

      @Nonnull public static Collection build(@Nonnull ColumnRepresentation columnRepresentation, @Nonnull Enumerations.FHIRDefinedType fhirType)
      Builds the appropriate subtype of Collection based upon the supplied Enumerations.FHIRDefinedType.

      Use this builder when the path is derived, e.g. the result of a function.

      Parameters:
      columnRepresentation - a ColumnRepresentation containing the result of the expression
      fhirType - the Enumerations.FHIRDefinedType that this path should be based upon
      Returns:
      a new Collection
      Throws:
      CollectionConstructionError - if there is a problem constructing the collection

    • classForType

      @Nonnull public static Optional<Class<? extends Collection>> classForType(@Nonnull Enumerations.FHIRDefinedType fhirType)
      Parameters:
      fhirType - a Enumerations.FHIRDefinedType
      Returns:
      The subtype of Collection that represents this type

      Returns a new StringCollection representing the String representation of the input using the Spark SQL cast to string type.
      Parameters:
      collection - The input collection
      Returns:
      A new StringCollection representing the String representation of the input

    • typeEquivalentWith

      public boolean typeEquivalentWith(@Nonnull Collection other)
      Check if this collection is type equivalent with the other collection. The equivalence is based on the type and fhirType of the collections.
      Parameters:
      other - the other collection
      Returns:
      true if the other collection is type equivalent with this collection

    • castAs

      @Nonnull public Collection castAs(@Nonnull Collection other)
      Casts this collection to the type of another collection.

      This method attempts to cast the current collection to match the type of the provided collection. The cast will only succeed if the current collection is convertible to the target collection type as determined by the convertibleTo(Collection) method.

      Parameters:
      other - The collection whose type to cast to
      Returns:
      A new collection with the same values but cast to the type of the other collection
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - If this collection cannot be cast to the type of the other collection

    • asBooleanPath

      @Nonnull public BooleanCollection asBooleanPath()
      Returns:
      a new Collection representing the Boolean representation of this path

    • asBooleanSingleton

      @Nonnull public BooleanCollection asBooleanSingleton()
      Gets a new BooleanCollection representing this collection as a singular Boolean value. Throws an exception during evaluation if the collection is not singular.
      Returns:
      a new Collection represented as singular Boolean value.

    • fromValue

      @Nonnull public static Collection fromValue(@Nonnull IBase value)
      Creates a new collection from the given FHIR resource value.
      Parameters:
      value - the FHIR resource value to convert to a collection
      Returns:
      a new collection representing the FHIR resource value
      Throws:
      CollectionConstructionError - if there is a problem constructing the collection
